title: Breakout Clone
body: A clone of the game Breakout written in C using SDL to get accustomed to both.

title: Space Shooter
body: My second attempt at making a spaceshooter utilising MonoGame and C#.

title: Pathfinding Test
body: A console application where I implemented and used the A* algorithm for pathfinding.

title: Text Adventure
body: A simple text adventure written in C#. The first "bigger" project I made in C#.
